This file was generated by Qt/CMake.
TPanel needs network access to connect to a controler (NetLinx). Also for intercom and SIP network connection is necessary.
The locations are only used to keep the application running in the background. The location information is never used nor send to any server.
The locations are only used to keep the application running in the background. The location information is never used nor send to any server.

Microphone access is needed for intercom and SIP. Intercom is the possibility to establish a connection to another instance of TPanel on another device. Then the microphone is redirected to the other device and also the other way around like a phone. SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) is a standard way for VOIP (Voice Over IP). TPanel supports this protocol and needs access to the microphone to let the user talk to another SIP device.
TPanel is using the Qt framework and this framework has support for the camera. TPanel does not use the camera at all! Therefore you can safely deny access.
